description:
Orgasmic Edging is the practice of controlling someone’s (or your own) sexual climax, riding the edge of pleasure for an extended period without fully climaxing. Sometimes called edging or surfing, orgasm control is coming just up to the point of orgasm without achieving climax, often staying at the point just prior to orgasm for an extended period. Lady Frost discusses and demonstrates how to edge your female or male partner, or even yourself…to help achieve the most extended and mind-blowing orgasms possible.

In this tutorial you’ll learn:
-What is the purpose of orgasm control
-How can it be used during BDSM or Dom/sub play
-How is it achieved in both males and females
-How edging can help solve premature ejaculation
-How it can help you and your partner achieve simultaneous (even multiple) orgasms
-What are the effects on the body?

Use this tool that every body possesses to prolong pleasure, intensify orgasm, and extend play with your partner.
title: Edging: Orgasm Control & Denial for Maximum Climax
